WorkItem.Summary: Formulas with Ranges over merged cells don't work

Comments.Message: :-( I'm currently unable to reproduce the problem.

Now I'm able to reproduce it again. Attaching updated Excel file.
Reproduced in 1.7.6 and current SVN Head.
With 1.7.6 the error message is: 

 PHP Fatal error:  Call to a member function cellExists() on a non-object in PHPExcel/Calculation.php on line 3209
Still unable to reproduce. The example is from a larger worksheet. Formula needs to be inserted into a different worksheet. Also seems to affect VLOOKUP() only.
